  • Method Details

    • addSuperhero

      @PostMapping("/addSuperhero") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SuperheroDto> addSuperhero(@RequestBody SuperheroDto superheroDto)

    • getAllSuperheroes

      @GetMapping("/getAllSuperheroes") public SuperheroResponse getAllSuperheroes(@RequestParam(value="pages",defaultValue="0",required=false) int pages, @RequestParam(value="pageSize",defaultValue="10",required=false) int pageSize)
      Get mapping for the listing of all superheroes.
      Parameters:
      pages - The number of pages.
      pageSize - The size of the page.
      Returns:
      allSuperheroes The list of all the superheroes with pagination.

    • getSuperheroById

      @GetMapping("/getSuperheroById/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SuperheroDto> getSuperheroById(@PathVariable Long id)
      Get mapping for the listing of an specific superhero.
      Parameters:
      Id - The specified id.

    • getSuperheroByName

      @GetMapping("/getSuperheroByName/{name}") public List<SuperheroDto> getSuperheroByName(@PathVariable String name)
      Get mapping for listing of all superheroes that share a string in their name.
      Parameters:
      name - The string specified in the petition.

    • patchSuperhero

      @PatchMapping("/patchSuperhero/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SuperheroDto> patchSuperhero(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody SuperheroDto superheroDto)
      Patch mapping for updating a superhero.
      Parameters:
      superheroDto - The body of the request in dto format.
      Id - The specified id.

    • deleteSuperhero

      @DeleteMapping("/deleteSuperhero/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deleteSuperhero(@PathVariable Long id)
      Delete mapping for the deletion of a superhero.
      Parameters:
      Id - The specified id.
